parts.text:
```json
{
  "trip_summary": {
    "from": "Hokkaido",
    "to": "Osaka",
    "best_travel_options": [
      "Flight + Train",
      "Train"
    ],
    "estimated_budget_range": "¥30,000 - ¥100,000",
    "summary_description": "Traveling from Hokkaido to Osaka offers a diverse experience, transitioning from the northern island's natural beauty to the vibrant Kansai region. Consider a combination of air travel and the Shinkansen for speed or a scenic rail journey for a more immersive experience. Osaka offers incredible food, nightlife, and cultural sights.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/hokkaido_osaka_image.jpg"
  },
  "transportation": [
    {
      "method": "Flight",
      "from": "New Chitose Airport (CTS), Sapporo",
      "to": "Itami Airport (ITM), Osaka",
      "duration": "1 hour 30 minutes",
      "cost_range": "¥8,000 - ¥30,000",
      "booking_link": "https://www.example-airline.com/flights/cts-itm",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/flight_image.jpg"
    },
    {
      "method": "Train",
      "from": "Itami Airport (ITM) Station",
      "to": "Osaka Station",
      "duration": "30 minutes",
      "cost_range": "¥500 - ¥800",
      "booking_link": "https://www.example-jr.com/trains/itami-osaka",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/train_image.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "accommodations": [
    {
      "category": "Budget",
      "name": "J-Hoppers Osaka Universal",
      "price_per_night": "¥3,000",
      "booking_link": "https://www.example-hostel.com/j-hoppers-osaka",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/jhoppers_image.jpg"
    },
    {
      "category": "Mid-Range",
      "name": "Hotel Granvia Osaka",
      "price_per_night": "¥12,000",
      "booking_link": "https://www.example-hotel.com/granvia-osaka",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/granvia_image.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "attractions": [
    {
      "name": "Osaka Castle",
      "description": "A symbol of Osaka, offering historical exhibits and panoramic city views.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Spring (cherry blossoms) or Autumn (foliage)",
      "entry_fee": "¥600",
      "location": "Osaka-jo, Chuo-ku, Osaka",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/osaka_castle_image.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Dotonbori",
      "description": "Famous for its vibrant street food, nightlife, and the Glico Running Man sign.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Evening for the illuminated signs and lively atmosphere",
      "entry_fee": "Free (food and activities cost extra)",
      "location": "Dotonbori, Chuo-ku, Osaka",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/dotonbori_image.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "food_recommendations": [
    {
      "dish": "Takoyaki",
      "description": "Ball-shaped octopus dumplings, a quintessential Osaka street food.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Dotonbori stalls",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/takoyaki_image.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Okonomiyaki",
      "description": "Savory pancake containing various ingredients, cooked on a griddle.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Fugetsu (various locations)",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/okonomiyaki_image.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "travel_tips": [
    "Purchase a Japan Rail Pass if planning extensive travel by train.",
    "Learn basic Japanese phrases for smoother interactions.",
    "Carry cash as some smaller establishments may not accept credit cards.",
    "Be aware of rush hour on public transport."
  ]
}
```
